name: Keijo Forest Escape
description:
In Keijo's forest escape Keijo has lost himself in the woods your goal is to help him survive as long as possible before he is inevitably eaten by the wolves.    

Controls:

Use WASD and SCROLL to move camera. Use 1, 2 and 3 to place nature.

1. a regular tree that will block the wolves path and sight.

2. a scary tree that Keijo will run away from.

3. a bush that Keijo will run towards and eat.

Proudly presented by Muumipeikon salakilta: Eppu Melto,  Aaro Luomala and Risto Haila
